channel.title: Tag: esp8266 - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: I Made a WiFi Pumpkin
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I made a wifi pumpkin using an ESP8266 with LED matrix eyes and mouth. I added a web-based remote control for my phone using websockets. It was fun!</body></html>
